document_data.mainbody:
Ellie was a young fisherwoman from the city of Elturel, whose life was cut short in the late 15 century DR.
Ellie had a dark skin and curly reddish-brown hair. At the time of her death, the fisherwoman wore a simple blue tunic.
In the , a spelljammer squid ship crashed into the shores of the River Chionthar. Ellie was a young fisherwoman who, along with several other poor souls, witnessed the crash. She saw an elven lass run from the crash, one of the survivors â€“ the woman named Shadowheart, and Ellie ran to aid her. Unfortunately, the elf was not the only one to survive and Ellie was ripped to shreds by intellect devourers who were onboard the magical vessel. The fisherwomans body was left on the beach by the burning spelljammer.
